revised_title: Exploration and Observations of Natural Wonders in Derbyshire
tldr: The author, J. Martyn, shares his observations and findings during a journey to the Peak in Derbyshire. He discusses various natural wonders, including Mam-tor, Elden-hole, Buxton-Well, Peak's Hole, and Pool's Hole. He also describes the local flora, including rare plants, and the lead mines in the area. Martyn's observations provide valuable insights into the geology, hydrology, and botany of Derbyshire.
